page.title: 17Pollution in Galloway
page.content: Most of the nuclear pollution comes from Windscale. It is let into the Solway. People have estimated there is about 0.25 of a ton in the mud and it is increasing every year. There is also acid rain in Galloway. It comes from large factories and power stations all over the world. The chemicals are let out of large chimneys and rise into the air. It is then blown around. Some goes to other countries but quite a lot comes to Galloway. When it finally falls as acid rain it kills trees and as it collects in rivers it kills water life. In 1983 it was discovered there were 7 lochs without fish and 11 lochs with hardly any fish in Dumfries and Galloway. This just shows how much damage acid rain does.
